data.name: Remodel Your IT Strategy - To Deal with COVID-19 Impact
data.summary:
COVID-19 has disrupted businesses. IT Leaders are now coping with the unknown, required to do more with less, with limited budgets, time and resources. How do they manage this? Join me at the Webinar alongside Expert
Panelistâ€™s to address these issues and obtain solutions to business and technology challenges
data.speakers:
Sharad Aggrawal, Head, IT, JK Tyres
Pinkesh Ambavat, CIO, CRIF India
Giridhar Yasa, Principle Technology Architect, Flipkart
Shrikant Appana, Executive VP - IT, BFIL
